name: EOW_APPOINTMENT_REQUESTS
description: This table contains appointment requests that are linked to this In Basket message.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the In Basket message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: Stores the appointment request record that is related to the In Basket message.
